text: Aldonza is the name of: *Aldonza Alfonso de León (c. 1215-1266), illegitimate daughter of King Alfonso IX of León and his mistress Aldonza Martínez de Silva *Aldonza Lorenzo, the real name of Dulcinea del Toboso, a fictional character from Don Quixote *Antonio Aldonza (1926–2014), Spanish footballer
title: Aldonza
